# Spec: GitGotchi Project Setup

## Overview
Initialize GitGotchi as a Python CLI application with proper project structure.

## Requirements
- Python 3.10+
- Virtual environment setup
- Dependencies: rich, gitpython, anthropic, sqlalchemy, typer
- Basic CLI entry point using Typer
- .kiro directory with initial steering doc

## Deliverables
1. Project folder structure
2. requirements.txt with pinned versions
3. Basic CLI that prints "GitGotchi v0.1.0"
4. .kiro/steering/code_style.md with Python conventions

## Acceptance Criteria
- [x] Complete folder structure created
- [x] requirements.txt with all dependencies
- [x] Working CLI using Typer and Rich
- [x] Code style steering document
- [x] Project voice steering document

## Implementation Status
All deliverables completed. Project is initialized and ready for feature development.
